content:
Hello,

I missed the checkoff for pset 2 and I was wondering if there's any way I can still make it up. Because of the four day weekend last week, I couldn't go into office hours on Monday or Tuesday, and was told at the next office hours that it was too late to make up the pset 2 checkoff. I'm not on PNR and if possible, would be very grateful for the opportunity to explain my pset 2 code for a checkoff. I have two late days left I haven't used yet.

Thank you!
subject: pset 2 checkoff

content: Unfortunately we have to stick to the course policy for these cases. However, we will take it into consideration when doing final grades.
